text: Crud or CRUD may refer to: * Waste, dirt, feces, or something of poor quality * Create, read, update, and delete (CRUD), basic functions of a computer database * Crud (game), a game played on a billiard table * CRUD (radio station), a former radio station of Rochdale College in Toronto, Canada ==See also== * Crud Puppy, a fictional character
title: Crud
